pages.text: Place a potion or any item with 'potion effects' in the pedestal, the upgrade will effect any matching entity in the area and apply its effects, which consumes the item.$(br)If you drop blaze powder on the pedestal, the upgrade will consume the powder instead of the item.$(br)This upgrade can accept:$(li)Range - Increases Effective Area$(li)Speed - Increases Detection Speed for applying effects.
